src_original: kati kāmapratisaṃyuktāḥ /  aṣṭādaśānāṃ dhātūnām iti sambadhyate /
tat sarvaṃ kāmadhātusaṅgṛhītam /
catvāro viṣayadhātavaḥ ,  tadviṣayavijñāna[p. 126]dhātavaś catvāraḥ -- ete caturdaśa rūpadhātupratisaṃyuktāḥ /
kim punaḥ kāraṇaṃ gandharasayo rūpadhātau na bhāvas tadvijñānayoś ca /  gandharasau hy ekāntena kavaḍīkārāhārasvabhāvāv eva ,  na tu sparśavedanāhārasvabhāvau /
na svataḥ ,  tatra sapta cittadhātavo 'lobhādveṣāmohasamprayuktāḥ kuśalāḥ /
lobhadveṣamohasamprayuktā akuśalāḥ /
anya avyākṛtāḥ /
rūpaśabdadhātū kuśalākuśalacittasamutthāpitau kuśalākuśalau kāyavāgvijñaptisaṅgṛhītau /
ato 'nyāv avyākṛtau /
dharmadhātur alobhādisvabhāvasamprayuktasamutthaḥ pratisaṅkhyānirodhas tathatā ca kuśalaḥ /  lobhādisvabhāvasamprayuktasamuttho 'kuśalaḥ /
katy ādhyātmikāḥ /  aṣṭādaśānāṃ dhātūnām iti sambadhyate /  dvādaśa /

te tu na prajñāyante katamedvādaśety āha -- rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmadhātūn sthāpayitveti /  śeṣāḥ ṣaḍ indriyadhātavaḥ ṣaḍ vijñānadhātava ity ete dvādaśādhyātmikāḥ //  kati dhātavo bāhyāḥ /  ṣaṭ /
te tu na vijñāyanta ity ata āha -- ye sthāpitāḥ /  ete bāhyā iti boddhavyāḥ /  ke ca sthāpitāḥ /  rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmadhātavaḥ /  adhy ātmānam adhyātmam /  adhyātmam evādhyātmikam /
ātmany asati katham ādhyātmikaṃ bāhyaṃ vā bhavati /
ahaṅkārasanniśritatvāc cittam ātmety upacaryate /
uktaṃ hi bhagavatā -- ātmanā hi sudāntena svargaṃ prāpnoti paṇḍita iti /
cittasya cānyatra damanam uktam -- cittasya damanaṃ sādhu ,
cittaṃ dāntaṃ sukhāvaham iti /  atra hi cittasya damanaṃ cittam eva dāntaṃ sukhāvaham ity uktam /  ato 'trāpy ātmanā hi sudāntena svargaṃ prāpnoti paṇḍita iti cittam evābhipretam iti vijñāyate /
ataś cātmabhūtasya cittasyāśrayabhāvena pratyāsannatvāc cakṣurādīnām ādhyātmikatvam /
rūpādīnāṃ ca viṣayabhāvād bāhyatvam /
